chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's focus on confirming Charlie's last known whereabouts, especially if anyone saw him leave the cafeteria and head towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Let's clarify the timeline: after we all saw Charlie doing the trash task in the cafeteria, did anyone notice him leaving and heading towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security?

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Perhaps we should all state where we were *after* seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, to establish a clear timeline.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I agree with Erin; let's establish a timeline by stating our locations after we saw Charlie in the cafeteria—I moved to Admin after completing my task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I noticed Charlie was working on the cafeteria trash task earlier, so maybe they were just moving around to complete more tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Charlie was indeed working on the cafeteria trash task because I saw him doing it when I was there, so his movements might just be him completing tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I saw Charlie doing the cafeteria trash task too, so his movements seem consistent with completing tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: It's interesting that three people saw Charlie doing a single task; were you all in the cafeteria at the same time, or spread out over a longer period?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Yes, Erin, we were all in the cafeteria at the same time, which is why multiple people saw Charlie doing the trash task.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, where did you find Charlie's body, and did you see anyone else nearby?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Bob, could you clarify where exactly you found Charlie's body? Knowing the location might help us figure out who was nearby.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: If everyone was in the cafeteria, then wouldn't someone have seen Charlie leave to go to Electrical, Medbay, and Security like I said I saw?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I haven't found Charlie's body; I think there might be some confusion, as I was just confirming that I saw him doing the trash task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's focus on confirming Charlie's last known whereabouts, especially if anyone saw him leave the cafeteria and head towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Let's clarify the timeline: after we all saw Charlie doing the trash task in the cafeteria, did anyone notice him leaving and heading towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Perhaps we should all state where we were *after* seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, to establish a clear timeline.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I agree with Erin; let's establish a timeline by stating our locations after we saw Charlie in the cafeteria—I moved to Admin after completing my task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I agree with Erin and Bob's suggestion to establish a timeline; after seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I moved to the Weapons room to start the "Calibrate Targeting System" task.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: After seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I went to Medbay to scan, then directly to Security to check cameras, which is why I found it odd no one else saw him moving around.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, could you specify if you saw anyone else around when you noticed Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, or Security? It might help us figure out who was nearby at the time.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's ensure we have a clear timeline of everyone's movements after the cafeteria to help identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behaviors.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, since you're emphasizing the timeline, could you share where you went after the cafeteria? This might help us ensure everyone's movements are accounted for.

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I agree with Erin and Bob's suggestion to establish a timeline; after seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I moved to the Weapons room to start the "Calibrate Targeting System" task.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, could you specify if you saw anyone else around when you noticed Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, or Security? It might help us figure out who was nearby at the time.

chat_messages: chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I saw Charlie go into Electrical, then Medbay, then head towards Security... is anyone else finding that a bit sus?

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I noticed Charlie was working on the cafeteria trash task earlier, so maybe they were just moving around to complete more tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Charlie was indeed working on the cafeteria trash task because I saw him doing it when I was there, so his movements might just be him completing tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I saw Charlie doing the cafeteria trash task too, so his movements seem consistent with completing tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: It's interesting that three people saw Charlie doing a single task; were you all in the cafeteria at the same time, or spread out over a longer period?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Yes, Erin, we were all in the cafeteria at the same time, which is why multiple people saw Charlie doing the trash task.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, where did you find Charlie's body, and did you see anyone else nearby?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Bob, could you clarify where exactly you found Charlie's body? Knowing the location might help us figure out who was nearby.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: If everyone was in the cafeteria, then wouldn't someone have seen Charlie leave to go to Electrical, Medbay, and Security like I said I saw?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I haven't found Charlie's body; I think there might be some confusion, as I was just confirming that I saw him doing the trash task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's focus on confirming Charlie's last known whereabouts, especially if anyone saw him leave the cafeteria and head towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Let's clarify the timeline: after we all saw Charlie doing the trash task in the cafeteria, did anyone notice him leaving and heading towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Perhaps we should all state where we were *after* seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, to establish a clear timeline.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I agree with Erin; let's establish a timeline by stating our locations after we saw Charlie in the cafeteria—I moved to Admin after completing my task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I agree with Erin and Bob's suggestion to establish a timeline; after seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I moved to the Weapons room to start the "Calibrate Targeting System" task.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: After seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I went to Medbay to scan, then directly to Security to check cameras, which is why I found it odd no one else saw him moving around.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: It's interesting that three people saw Charlie doing a single task; were you all in the cafeteria at the same time, or spread out over a longer period?

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: If everyone was in the cafeteria, then wouldn't someone have seen Charlie leave to go to Electrical, Medbay, and Security like I said I saw?

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I agree with Erin; let's establish a timeline by stating our locations after we saw Charlie in the cafeteria—I moved to Admin after completing my task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I agree with Erin and Bob's suggestion to establish a timeline; after seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I moved to the Weapons room to start the "Calibrate Targeting System" task.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: After seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I went to Medbay to scan, then directly to Security to check cameras, which is why I found it odd no one else saw him moving around.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, could you specify if you saw anyone else around when you noticed Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, or Security? It might help us figure out who was nearby at the time.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's ensure we have a clear timeline of everyone's movements after the cafeteria to help identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behaviors.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, since you're emphasizing the timeline, could you share where you went after the cafeteria? This might help us ensure everyone's movements are accounted for.

chat_messages: chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I saw Charlie go into Electrical, then Medbay, then head towards Security... is anyone else finding that a bit sus?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I noticed Charlie was working on the cafeteria trash task earlier, so maybe they were just moving around to complete more tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Charlie was indeed working on the cafeteria trash task because I saw him doing it when I was there, so his movements might just be him completing tasks.
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I saw Charlie doing the cafeteria trash task too, so his movements seem consistent with completing tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: It's interesting that three people saw Charlie doing a single task; were you all in the cafeteria at the same time, or spread out over a longer period?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Yes, Erin, we were all in the cafeteria at the same time, which is why multiple people saw Charlie doing the trash task.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, where did you find Charlie's body, and did you see anyone else nearby?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Bob, could you clarify where exactly you found Charlie's body? Knowing the location might help us figure out who was nearby.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: If everyone was in the cafeteria, then wouldn't someone have seen Charlie leave to go to Electrical, Medbay, and Security like I said I saw?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I haven't found Charlie's body; I think there might be some confusion, as I was just confirming that I saw him doing the trash task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's focus on confirming Charlie's last known whereabouts, especially if anyone saw him leave the cafeteria and head towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security.
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Let's clarify the timeline: after we all saw Charlie doing the trash task in the cafeteria, did anyone notice him leaving and heading towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Perhaps we should all state where we were *after* seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, to establish a clear timeline.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I agree with Erin; let's establish a timeline by stating our locations after we saw Charlie in the cafeteria—I moved to Admin after completing my task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I agree with Erin and Bob's suggestion to establish a timeline; after seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I moved to the Weapons room to start the "Calibrate Targeting System" task.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: After seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I went to Medbay to scan, then directly to Security to check cameras, which is why I found it odd no one else saw him moving around.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, could you specify if you saw anyone else around when you noticed Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, or Security? It might help us figure out who was nearby at the time.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's ensure we have a clear timeline of everyone's movements after the cafeteria to help identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behaviors.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, since you're emphasizing the timeline, could you share where you went after the cafeteria? This might help us ensure everyone's movements are accounted for.

chat_messages: chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I saw Charlie go into Electrical, then Medbay, then head towards Security... is anyone else finding that a bit sus?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I noticed Charlie was working on the cafeteria trash task earlier, so maybe they were just moving around to complete more tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Charlie was indeed working on the cafeteria trash task because I saw him doing it when I was there, so his movements might just be him completing tasks.
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I saw Charlie doing the cafeteria trash task too, so his movements seem consistent with completing tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: It's interesting that three people saw Charlie doing a single task; were you all in the cafeteria at the same time, or spread out over a longer period?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Yes, Erin, we were all in the cafeteria at the same time, which is why multiple people saw Charlie doing the trash task.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, where did you find Charlie's body, and did you see anyone else nearby?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Bob, could you clarify where exactly you found Charlie's body? Knowing the location might help us figure out who was nearby.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: If everyone was in the cafeteria, then wouldn't someone have seen Charlie leave to go to Electrical, Medbay, and Security like I said I saw?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I haven't found Charlie's body; I think there might be some confusion, as I was just confirming that I saw him doing the trash task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's focus on confirming Charlie's last known whereabouts, especially if anyone saw him leave the cafeteria and head towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security.
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Let's clarify the timeline: after we all saw Charlie doing the trash task in the cafeteria, did anyone notice him leaving and heading towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Perhaps we should all state where we were *after* seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, to establish a clear timeline.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I agree with Erin; let's establish a timeline by stating our locations after we saw Charlie in the cafeteria—I moved to Admin after completing my task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I agree with Erin and Bob's suggestion to establish a timeline; after seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I moved to the Weapons room to start the "Calibrate Targeting System" task.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: After seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I went to Medbay to scan, then directly to Security to check cameras, which is why I found it odd no one else saw him moving around.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, could you specify if you saw anyone else around when you noticed Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, or Security? It might help us figure out who was nearby at the time.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's ensure we have a clear timeline of everyone's movements after the cafeteria to help identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behaviors.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, since you're emphasizing the timeline, could you share where you went after the cafeteria? This might help us ensure everyone's movements are accounted for.

chat_messages: chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I saw Charlie go into Electrical, then Medbay, then head towards Security... is anyone else finding that a bit sus?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I noticed Charlie was working on the cafeteria trash task earlier, so maybe they were just moving around to complete more tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Charlie was indeed working on the cafeteria trash task because I saw him doing it when I was there, so his movements might just be him completing tasks.
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I saw Charlie doing the cafeteria trash task too, so his movements seem consistent with completing tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: It's interesting that three people saw Charlie doing a single task; were you all in the cafeteria at the same time, or spread out over a longer period?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Yes, Erin, we were all in the cafeteria at the same time, which is why multiple people saw Charlie doing the trash task.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, where did you find Charlie's body, and did you see anyone else nearby?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Bob, could you clarify where exactly you found Charlie's body? Knowing the location might help us figure out who was nearby.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: If everyone was in the cafeteria, then wouldn't someone have seen Charlie leave to go to Electrical, Medbay, and Security like I said I saw?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I haven't found Charlie's body; I think there might be some confusion, as I was just confirming that I saw him doing the trash task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's focus on confirming Charlie's last known whereabouts, especially if anyone saw him leave the cafeteria and head towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security.
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Let's clarify the timeline: after we all saw Charlie doing the trash task in the cafeteria, did anyone notice him leaving and heading towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Perhaps we should all state where we were *after* seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, to establish a clear timeline.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I agree with Erin; let's establish a timeline by stating our locations after we saw Charlie in the cafeteria—I moved to Admin after completing my task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I agree with Erin and Bob's suggestion to establish a timeline; after seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I moved to the Weapons room to start the "Calibrate Targeting System" task.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: After seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I went to Medbay to scan, then directly to Security to check cameras, which is why I found it odd no one else saw him moving around.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, could you specify if you saw anyone else around when you noticed Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, or Security? It might help us figure out who was nearby at the time.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's ensure we have a clear timeline of everyone's movements after the cafeteria to help identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behaviors.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, since you're emphasizing the timeline, could you share where you went after the cafeteria? This might help us ensure everyone's movements are accounted for.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I noticed Charlie was working on the cafeteria trash task earlier, so maybe they were just moving around to complete more tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Charlie was indeed working on the cafeteria trash task because I saw him doing it when I was there, so his movements might just be him completing tasks.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I saw Charlie doing the cafeteria trash task too, so his movements seem consistent with completing tasks.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: It's interesting that three people saw Charlie doing a single task; were you all in the cafeteria at the same time, or spread out over a longer period?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Yes, Erin, we were all in the cafeteria at the same time, which is why multiple people saw Charlie doing the trash task.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, where did you find Charlie's body, and did you see anyone else nearby?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Bob, could you clarify where exactly you found Charlie's body? Knowing the location might help us figure out who was nearby.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: If everyone was in the cafeteria, then wouldn't someone have seen Charlie leave to go to Electrical, Medbay, and Security like I said I saw?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I haven't found Charlie's body; I think there might be some confusion, as I was just confirming that I saw him doing the trash task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's focus on confirming Charlie's last known whereabouts, especially if anyone saw him leave the cafeteria and head towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Let's clarify the timeline: after we all saw Charlie doing the trash task in the cafeteria, did anyone notice him leaving and heading towards Electrical, Medbay, or Security?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Perhaps we should all state where we were *after* seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, to establish a clear timeline.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I agree with Erin; let's establish a timeline by stating our locations after we saw Charlie in the cafeteria—I moved to Admin after completing my task in the cafeteria.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, could you clarify the timing of when you saw Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, and Security? It might help us narrow down the timeline.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I agree with Erin and Bob's suggestion to establish a timeline; after seeing Charlie in the cafeteria, I moved to the Weapons room to start the "Calibrate Targeting System" task.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, could you specify if you saw anyone else around when you noticed Charlie in Electrical, Medbay, or Security? It might help us figure out who was nearby at the time.
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Let's ensure we have a clear timeline of everyone's movements after the cafeteria to help identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behaviors.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, since you're emphasizing the timeline, could you share where you went after the cafeteria? This might help us ensure everyone's movements are accounted for.
